abstract: The Russian billionaire Mikhail Prokhorov will soon be bringing his considerable charm and resources to bear on the moribund Nets.
snippet: The Russian billionaire Mikhail Prokhorov will soon be bringing his considerable charm and resources to bear on the moribund Nets.
lead_paragraph: Mikhail D. Prokhorov has a net worth of $17.8 billion, enough to buy every team in the National Basketball Association, stock them with All-Stars and take them on a world tour aboard his 200-foot yacht, Howard Beck reports in The New York Times.
